document.full_text: u.s. crude fell on monday for a third day in the lowest trading volume of the year, as libyan rebels regained key territory and redoubled efforts to resume oil exports from the opec country.
document.title: oil falls in low volume as libyan rebels gain ground
lines_and_colors: u.s. crude fell on monday for a third day in the lowest trading volume of the year, as libyan rebels regained key territory and redoubled efforts to resume oil exports from the opec country.
